title: Purina Tidy Cats Breeze Cat Litter Extra Strength Refill Bundle
description: Manage odor control in your multi-cat household with this Purina Tidy Cats Breeze Extra Strength Refill Bundle Pack. Designed for our innovative Tidy Cats Breeze cat litter box system (sold separately), this kitty litter refill includes eight cat litter pee pads and one 7-lb bag of enhanced, non clumping litter pellets for easy cat litter box care. The scented cat litter pellets are the best Breeze pellets for odor control and feature an Active Clean scent to help you maintain a fresh smelling home. Urine passes through the mess-minimizing kitty litter pellets and is soaked up by the super-absorbent pad below. It locks in moisture to keep your cats dry and comfy when they use the cat litter box. Solid waste stays on top of the lightweight cat litter pellets for quick and easy scooping. Our Breeze kitty litter pads help prevent ammonia odor from forming for one week for two cats, and the anti-tracking pellet cat litter is 99.9 percent dust free for a clean pour into the cat litter box.
